name: Rock Knight
description:
Creating this took WAAAY more than 3h! Was half a day or so...

Intro:

The holy order of Rock Knights have fallen ill to the munchies curse! You are the the last one of the knights! You have to escape. Use your rock-throwing skills to escape this dungeon!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows + Mouse
